topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d31c006368727e883d0200#post_53d31c006368727e883d0200
[bq="Shadow_the_Hedgehog"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d31bc76368726e8a2d0200#post_53d31bc76368726e8a2d0200

No! I don't want to get cursed for 1000 years[/bq]
You know, call me weird but if mythology was real I'd be that person trying to find peaceful solutions to things like that.  I know it's a bit of stretch but I always get called "weird" and such for trying to be a goody goody two shoes even in the most fucked up situations despite the fact I know I'm not.  If I had to summarize how I act in real life it would be a perverted Byakuren who likes video games.  Call me a hopeless idealist but I genuinely care about people whether or not I know them.
